title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 47 (Alcoholis
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 47 (Alcoholism, Drug Abuse 3):

More titles about alcoholism and drug abuse can be found in collections 3, 20 & 21 in this series. Here, we have 35 more titles.

-  Adams - Hideous Absinthe; a History of the Devil in a Bottle (2004)

-  Agnew - Alcohol and Opium in the Old West; Use, Abuse and Influence (2014)

-  Cui et al (Eds.) - Neural-Immune Interactions in Brain Function and Alcohol Related Disorders (2013)

-  Dasgupta - The Science of Drinking; How Alcohol Affects Your Body and Mind (2011)

-  Dowdall - College Drinking; Reframing a Social Problem (2009)

-  Dudley - The Drunken Monkey; Why We Drink and Abuse Alcohol (2014)

-  Encyclopedia of Drugs, Alcohol & Addictive Behavior, 2e (2001)

-  Epstein & Gerszberg (Eds.) - Drinking Diaries; Women Serve Their Stories Straight Up (2012)

-  Galanter (Ed.) - Alcohol Problems in Adolescents and Young Adults; Epidemiology, Neurobiology, Prevention, and Treatment (2005)

-  Galanter (Ed.) - Recent Developments in Alcoholism; Vol. 13, Alcohol and Violence (2002)

-  Gately - Drink; a Cultural History of Alcohol (2008)

-  Gold & Adamec - The Encyclopedia of Alcoholism and Alcohol Abuse (2010)

-  Golden - Message in a Bottle; the Making of Fetal Alcohol Syndrome (2005)

-  Grimes - Alcoholism and Montana Indian People; Towards an Off-Reservation Solution (1975)

-  Guidot & Mehta (Eds.) - Alcohol Use Disorders and the Lung; a Clinical and Pathophysiological Approach (2014)

-  Johnson - The Cartel; the Inside Story of Britain's Biggest Drugs Gang (2012)

-  Joyce - Moonshine; a Cultural History of America's Infamous Liquor (2014)

-  Khaleghi - Free from Addiction; Facing Yourself and Embracing Recovery (2008)

-  Luna - Use and Abuse of Amphetamine-type Stimulants in the U.S.A (2001)

-  Madras & Kuhar (Eds.) - The Effects of Drug Abuse on the Human Nervous System (2014)

-  Martin-Evans - Reasons Mommy Drinks (2013)

-  McCrady & Epstein - Overcoming Alcohol Problems; Workbook for Couples (2009)

-  McGovern - Uncorking the Past; the Quest for Wine, Beer, and Other Alcoholic Beverages (2009)

-  McMurran (Ed.) - Alcohol-Related Violence; Prevention and Treatment (2013)

-  Orford - Addiction Dilemmas; Family Experience from Literature and Research and Their Challenges for Practice (2012)

-  Paton & Touquet (Eds.) - ABC of Alcohol, 4e (2005)

-  Prentiss - The Alcoholism and Addiction Cure; a Holistic Approach to Total Recovery (2006)

-  Regan - Intoxicating Minds; How Drugs Work (2001)

-  Rogers - If I Die Before I Wake; a Memoir of Drinking and Recovery (2010)

-  Schroeder - Ecstasy; Drugs, the Straight Facts (2004)

-  Siegel - Intoxication; the Universal Drive for Mind-Altering Substances (2005)

-  Simpson - Creating Wine; the Emergence of a World Industry, 1840-1914 (2011)

-  Spivak - Iconic Spirit; an Intoxicating History (2012)

-  Watson et al (Eds.) - Alcohol, Nutrition, and Health Consequences (2013)

-  WHO - Alcohol Use and Abuse; What You Should Know (2006)
